item.title: Building a marketplace
item.description:
Description

PyCon Finland 2015 Elena Oat - Building a marketplace

Motivation for this talk is sharing my own experience with implementing Stripe payments in a Django application. I will, specifically, touch on Stripe Connect which is meant for marketplaces. Django is still missing a package for this purpose.

The talk will include challenges faced and some of the solutions.

About the author: I've been a speaker in 2014 and 2013 at PyCon Finland. I am the founder of Helsinki PyLadies
item.dc:creator: Elena Oat
